trans-unit.source: Iterates over all ancestor nodes according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref> ancestor axis rules, and returns the nodes in document order without duplicates.
trans-unit.target: Iterar todos os nós predecessor de acordo com o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"> </xref> predecessor eixo regras e devolve os nós no documento ordem sem duplicados.

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing ancestors.
trans-unit.target: O nó a partir do qual iniciar predecessores a atravessar.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: Permite-lhe filtrar nós com base no nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you want the `context` node to be returned as a part of the iteration, instead of being filtered out.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se pretender que o `context` o nó a ser devolvido como parte da iteração, em vez de ser filtrado.
Devolve o navegador de resultado atual.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: O estado do navegador alterações apenas se o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A>método devolveu `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next ancestor node in document order.
trans-unit.target: Positions o iterator no nó predecessor seguinte na ordem do documento.

trans-unit.source: If the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o iterator foi definido para o próximo nó predecessor por ordem de documento, o método MoveNext define o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>propriedade para o navegador do resultado atual; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>propriedade permanece inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o iterator foi definido para o próximo nó predecessor por ordem de documento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
